website_summaries.verdict: A comprehensive flatware set of the highest quality. The best on the market.
pros: 18/10 steel is durable and resistant to rust
Includes a hostess set and 12 place settings
cons: Some reports of discoloration in the larger hostess set pieces

customer_reviews.title: Rust spots after 3 months!
customer_reviews.text: Started out well and beautiful when we got them in September. But we noticed in December sometime that there is RUST specifically on the knives around where the blade meets the handle. Almost every single one has it. Not happy!
customer_reviews.author: Seana Rose

customer_reviews.title: Rust, Rust, and more Rust
customer_reviews.text: The knives rusted within weeks of use, not sure why all the high ratings, very disappointed as these replaced a set we had for over 10 years without a hint of rust.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Risky - rusting one month.Thank GOD for AMAZON great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I originally gave good reviews on this item BUT - wait for it.... THE KNIVES WILL RUST SOON. The flatware has begun to show signs of rust spots only after a month. There are only two of us who live here so we have not over used (if that is possible) all the items by any means There is a lot of flatware here! So maybe a few times through the dishwasher for a few of the pieces? Rust spots already. Very surprised. Guess this is why the price is low? I paid 60 bucks. Perhaps they were getting rid of some factory seconds? So I bought again. Same thing.
customer_reviews.author: David.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect if you like Rusty silverware
customer_reviews.text: Perfect if you like Rusty silverware. After the first wash in a dishwasher, two-thirds of the knives showed rust spots, and inconsistent spots in the finish that could be felt with a fingernail. Called Lenox, they say rusty knives are not a defect! They also stated they would not honor the lifetime warranty when purchased from Amazon, as they could not verify you did not buy them "used!" They were very rude, and extremely unhelpful. Don't purchase from this company.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: After 5 months of use, Flatware Knives are RUSTING
customer_reviews.text: Purchased Product on December 11, 2016 and I received them as a Christmas present. I didn't open until January 2017. It is now July 2017 and more than half the knives are RUSTING. I contacted Lenox and waiting to hear about what they can do. I also registered the product after I received them so I am hoping they can fix this!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed! All of the knives in this set are ...
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed! All of the knives in this set are showing some rust. No problem with the rest of the silverware, so far but still very disappointed in the knives. We've had them less a month. We will be contacting the company.
customer_reviews.author: Jesica whitney

customer_reviews.title: Rust after one wash
customer_reviews.text: It looks nice at first but after one wash rust spots started to appear on the knives. Called Lenox customer service and they we're extremely rude. They essentially told me that it's my problem now since rust (even after ONE wash) isn't covered. Would NOT recommend this set to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THESE
customer_reviews.text: Hubby and I would purchase these over and over again....nicest set we've ever owned. Thank You Lenox! "Recent Update". Just spotted rust on one knife...even though I handwash, dry and put these away right away... Contacted Amazon CS...These people are AMAZING!!! Truly love shopping Amazon! Thanks Everyone...
customer_reviews.author: Terri H.

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY. These developed rust after a few months of use. I question how much nickel is actually in this product. Remember that 18/10 means 18% chromium, 10% nickel. The more nickel, the less likely it will rust.
customer_reviews.author: ROBERT L.

customer_reviews.title: NOT HAPPY. False advertisement
customer_reviews.text: I just received the Lenox Portola 65 piece flatware set, one of the reasons I ordered this set, it was shown in the pic as Lenox 18/10 being in the mold, instead when we received it looked cheap because it looked as it had ink written on it Lenox, Indonesia. NOT HAPPY. False advertisement.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Dillon

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice silverware set. They are a good weight, and I love the shape and design. Feels fancy 😊 We have had them for a few months now. We mostly use the dishwasher but sometimes hand wash if not many dishes. Recently cooked a turkey and it was VERY nice to have the hostess set that matched! Made my table look very nice. One spoon did get trapped in the garbage disposal 🤦🏻‍♀️ its now a bit cut up and jagged... but that’s not the spoons fault, it’s mine.
customer_reviews.author: JD12

customer_reviews.title: We're very happy with this flatware
customer_reviews.text: We're very happy with this flatware. It is very attractive and well made, and it was a phenomenal price for the set. One thing to be aware of is that this pattern is discontinued so not very many of the additional pieces are available. After doing a lot of research, we did switch to Seventh Generation dishwasher detergent pods to avoid the citrus ingredients, bleach, chlorine and artificial fragrances contained in the conventional detergent that we were using, all of which are supposed to be hard on stainless steel flatware. We haven't had this flatware for long and will report back if anything changes.
customer_reviews.author: JB in WI

customer_reviews.title: Stunning flatware
customer_reviews.text: Simply stunning simple flatware. It’s 18/10 stainless, but the polished finish makes it look like high quality silver shine!! My first set, all the knives had a manufacture imperfection/scratch on the blade, so returned and next set was free of any imperfections. Have been using for a few weeks and no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Sale

customer_reviews.title: Elegant style. feels nice. Great size
customer_reviews.text: It makes a beautiful table setting. Feels nice in your hand very smooth no rough edges it has a good weight but it’s not overly heavy it has a good size for fork and spoon to place in your mouth the knives are sharp but not a blade. Really a beautiful polish on it it came nicely put together it was just very very nice the packaging was nice but I took out and use every day is nice I don’t put it in the dishwasher they say you can but I just chose not to and it doesn’t take me any time to wash and dry just the silverware so
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. A

customer_reviews.title: Not so stain-less ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this flatware set about 3 months ago. Yesterday I noticed that a butter knife is now rusted. To be clear the knife has been washed several times in a new dishwasher that uses a drying agent so it's not like I left it in a bucket of water for a week... Caveat Emptor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Everday and Formal Use
customer_reviews.text: Dries to a nice shine with dish towel (I use cotton similar to flour sacking). Air drying results in water spots. Flatware has to be rewashed to remove. When removing from dishwasher I give each piece a quick wipe. Weight and lenght of each piece is a perfect size. This pattern is casual enough for everday use and elegant enough for a more formal table setting. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Gloria R Garmon

customer_reviews.title: I wish we could leave a good feedback for this flatware
customer_reviews.text: I wish we could leave a good feedback for this flatware, but we had the same problem with the knives rusting already. We're thinking Lenox needs to rethink wanting their name on this product. They look really nice design wise, but don't hold up very well at all.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Kuester

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: It was time to replace our very old and somewhat sketchy silverware. I had purchased 2 different sets from Kohl's and both rusted! Can't trust The Food Network I guess. I then purchased this set specifically, based on research (lol, Google) for the highest rated silverware. This was such a great deal! We've had it for several months now and it's kept it's shine, there's no rust. I do put them in the dishwasher from time to time as well.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany S.

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: After being in quarantine I am realizing things I don't like about the house. One of those was the cheap mismatched silverware we had. With some investigating I found out there is a lot to know when buying silverware that will last. After my research...this is the set I decided on and I'm so glad I did. They are sturdy and they look lovely. I have washed every piece several times and not rust and they look amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Boone

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Perfect replacement for the flatware we’ve had for the last 11 years. We wanted something durable and well balanced. Our old flatware was only 18/0 stainless and the knives almost immediately pitted and rusted. After the initial wash and a few after the new flatware from Lenox is still pristine. It is very durable without being heaving and it well balanced, out old set was very heavy on one end and the kids were constantly dropping their forks and spoons at dinner. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: 2nd Set...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this exact set a couple of years ago and they have been excellent. Washed by hand but mostly in the dishwasher, and not one bit of rust on any of the utensils anywhere. Bought these and gifted them to my mother. She loves them! A VERY GOOD set of silverware. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Premium Silverware
customer_reviews.text: They have a nice heft that feels great to entire family. They look and feel like the best silverware and very fine restaurants. They seem to be very sturdy. They are nice and shiny straight from the dishwasher to the drawer no fancy cleaning or care needed. The forks have a normal/narrow width so they don't feel like your literally trying to shovel food in the mouth.
customer_reviews.author: Hegon

customer_reviews.title: Most silverware is rusting after under two months of use!!!!
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed in this product. My husband and I did so much research when choosing which set to add to our wedding registry and decided to go with this brand. Unfortunately, even though the cost is just as much as other higher end products, the quality is not there. We opened them in February - it's April and around 50% of the silverware is rusted - it looks so gross. I'm so disappointed, but since this was a registry item there is no way for me to contact the seller to try and get a replacement shipped, and I cannot return these because it's passed the return window. It's truly a bummer - do not recommend this product or brand.
customer_reviews.author: lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Nice Gift
customer_reviews.text: I like the weight, finish and design. I purchased three sets so far, one for my home and two as gifts. I read complaints about rust but I guess we’ve been lucky because I regularly run them though the dishwasher with no issues. Price fluctuates a lot, so don’t be afraid to watch for a while before pulling the trigger. Best I found was seventy-seven. Also read reviews about utensil size. I attribute that to unfamiliarity. Why complain about that when you can simply return?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Rust!!!
customer_reviews.text: Just as others have said knives started to show rust after first wash. But too late for me to return as I have now had them for a while. Wish I would have read the reviews.
customer_reviews.author: SK R.

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully crafted and sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this flatware set. It’s still brand new to me so I can’t speak to how it will hold up over time but I have high hopes based on the sturdiness of the metal used to make it. Each piece is beautifully crafted and has a heaviness that makes it feel strong and expensive. I highly recommend this set for anyone looking to refresh their flatware, without being so cheap it rusts or so expensive it breaks the bank!
customer_reviews.author: Hilary

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I so love it!!! It's not just look very classic and elegant but sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth

customer_reviews.title: Knives rust after few times washed.
customer_reviews.text: Was looking forward to these after reading good reviews however, knives rusted after third wash! Have not even had for a month yet. Definitely not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this cheap silverware.
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made and stains easily. Rusty after two months. Our prior set was 25 years old...I wonder if I can get the set back from my son
customer_reviews.author: jetseller

customer_reviews.title: Rusty after a few months
customer_reviews.text: This silverware does not hold up. Don’t waste your money. Every knife is rusted. Hand washed or dishwasher washed, doesn’t matter. I can’t return them because it’s been 6 months. I’m beyond disappointed in the poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: Schmella

customer_reviews.title: Knives get rust spots
customer_reviews.text: Can’t believe it but my knives always come out with rust spots from the dishwasher.. only the knives thought but still a disappointment for the price I paid for this set and because they’re a reputable brand. I’ve had cheaper sets that didn’t do this.. Overall still love the set so I just spot clean the rust spots. It’s a very pretty set
customer_reviews.author: American Rose

customer_reviews.title: Very good choice
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend. Nice weight, feels good in your hand. Feels durable. Have same set from years ago, and was attempting to get more of the same. Pattern is a bit different, prices are a bit smaller, however I went with the smae because of the quality, and the new seems even better and stronger. Stronger means...when spoons are used as ice cream scoops, knifes as screw drivers, and forks to pry off lids... Your still in good shape and your silverware is not ruined!
customer_reviews.author: Caroline

customer_reviews.title: Make your mom use them..!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Their so nice,,,,,, my mom won't use them....!!!!( That's flipping honest too.....So after buying Cause we were short on forks,,,,, were still short on forks !!!!!)
customer_reviews.author: frank reeves

customer_reviews.title: Rust! Don’t buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Immediately the silverware was rusty. We contacted Lenox and were informed that we should hand wash it and that it is normal. That is not an acceptable response. We wasted $90 plus but learned not to purchase from Lenox!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney E. Sowers

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING. Nice weight. Shiny. Gorgeous.
customer_reviews.text: Can’t say enough about this set. I LOOOOOVE it. REALLY nice weight to them. (**Also: my favorite is the larger forks. I love long prongs on a fork, and these are long and perfectly spaced). I do wish the set came with more service ware. I can’t find JUST the service ware ANY where online. : (
customer_reviews.author: Autumn

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Flatware!
customer_reviews.text: After years of mismatched flatware I really didn't feel that this was a splurge purchase because of the reasonable price. Surprise - it was a splurge! The pieces are well-balanced, feel wonderful in my hands and they clean beautifully. There is also a discernable size difference between the dinner forks and salad forks as well as the tablespoons and teaspoons. Great choice!
customer_reviews.author: G1naG

customer_reviews.title: ... by a family of six and they still look like new. Washed in a dishwasher 90% of the ...
customer_reviews.text: This set is used daily by a family of six and they still look like new. Washed in a dishwasher 90% of the time. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: MFL

customer_reviews.title: 3 years later still looks like new!
customer_reviews.text: I RARELY post reviews but I have had this flatware for about 3 years now and I couldn't be happier. It has held up well and still looks new. It has a beautiful shimmer, is a nice weight, not too heavy nor too flimsy. I searched for months for new flatware and am so glad I found this. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: D. OKeefe

customer_reviews.title: Legitimacy questioned
customer_reviews.text: Nice set, however the name is not embossed In the flatware like in the picture, only laser etched. Kinda makes me question the legitimacy
customer_reviews.author: Primer for life

customer_reviews.title: A knife rusted after first wash in dishwasher
customer_reviews.text: We have a very similar Lenox set purchased at Macy's, marked as made in China. Over 10 years old, no rust. Bought this set marked as made in Indonesia, and it rusted immediately upon washing in dishwasher with Cascade Original dishwasher soap. If you buy this set, be sure and check the knives for rust where the blade joins the handle. See picture for details. Returning for a refund, will purchase something else.
customer_reviews.author: onlinebuyer

customer_reviews.title: Rust after one week!
customer_reviews.text: Our family was needing to replace the set we received as a wedding gift 13 years ago. We loved the set, but were missing pieces. I was excited about this set as it was heavy and sturdy and also beautiful! Unfortunately, within a week of use, the knives are already showing signs of rust!! I'm very disappointed as the description says "rust-free" and I was shocked when my husband pointed out the spots to me. We will be returning these pronto.
customer_reviews.author: torresfamily05

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful set of dinner ware.
customer_reviews.text: This set is really quite stunning considering how affordable it was. It is so so much better than anything my Mom has ever had; I can't imagine what she would think of a full sterling sliver set...lol. The weight and finish on the set is perfect. It is so nice to reach into the silverware drawer now and see a full matched set and pick up something that weighs more than what it would appear to. Ended up really making our Christmas dinner a show piece.
customer_reviews.author: Bydnmytime

customer_reviews.title: The silverware is very pretty and simple
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time in Lenox original packaging. 12 place settings and 5 piece serving set all individually wrapped to protect and keep them shining. The silverware is very pretty and simple. It is heavier than our Lenox Eternal by quite a bit when I weighed on our scale to see the difference. The knives were the biggest difference in weight, the handles are quite wide. The knives are also sharper than I realized. I cut my finger in 2 places while doing the initial washing! We really like the set and will update should anything change.
customer_reviews.author: JJNSAM

customer_reviews.title: You won't be sorry
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful! They came out of the box shiny and have maintained their sparkle through both handwashing and the dishwasher. They are heavy in a great way. They feel substantial and sturdy, not cheap or flimsy. I am so very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: FLC

customer_reviews.title: The Best Flatware for the price
customer_reviews.text: This Lenox flatware is exceptionally lovely, beyond expectations. It is weighted nicely, has a good shine to it. The style is versatile and goes with my contemporary dishes as well as my traditional sets. The knives have serration far enough down to actually cut a piece of meat! The instructions say you can put it in the dishwasher but you should make sure each piece is dried off before storing it. I've done that, and they are still shining and new looking.
customer_reviews.author: sdp

customer_reviews.title: Receive some definitely sub quality pieces
customer_reviews.text: What is happened to your quality control? Two of my knives are ridiculous,And I’d be afraid to let company use them. The end looks like it was literally broken off on the back corner sad face
customer_reviews.author: Sparky

customer_reviews.title: Portula Rises To Top Flatware for Entertaining Clients
customer_reviews.text: By far the best flatware I've ever owned. After 25 years of marriage my original pieces had becomed depleated over the years. Now I have service for 12 that is stylish and comtemporary. I had over 25 different patterns in my wishlist trying to decide between them. Once I saw Portula, I purchased the set rightaway. the weigh, feel in your hands, size and thickness are exactly right.
customer_reviews.author: Shanna S Roberts

customer_reviews.title: High quality and Value
customer_reviews.text: This collection is beautiful. It's simple and eye pleasing to all ages and gender. It will last a long time due to its precision formation and weight. Not too heavy and not too light. Two more bonuses are the fact that it's 12 place settings and has a hostess set. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: karen pyrett

customer_reviews.title: Knives rusted after 1 week
customer_reviews.text: After 1 round in the dishwasher many of the knives in this set - and only the knives - rusted. They now have large rust spots on the blade that we cannot remove. The knives and spoons are great, for some reason it is just the knives. I contacted Lenox, and they told me to take it up with Amazon. Amazon does not have an option to return knives only. Not sure what to do.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: elegant but sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a set of these when i got my kitchen redone I bought all new for the kitchen and i didn't remember what make these were, I searched the internet looking for them because after using them I knew they were keepers, i should have bought two sets. They are a nice weight and i just love everything about them that is why I wanted another set because over the years you loose a piece or two some how some way so I'm covered now :)
customer_reviews.author: shopper

customer_reviews.title: Best home silverware ever
customer_reviews.text: Best silverware ever. I decided that I'm finally well over 30, and I should stop using my parent's hand-me-down silverware from when I was in college. This set is simply amazing. So sturdy, and looks great. I did get around cyber Monday time so it was heavily discounted, this made it an even better value.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Skinner

customer_reviews.title: Stunning!  Great balance and sturdy.  Rated best value.  Good for transitional or traditional decor
customer_reviews.text: I read many reviews for the best quality flatware for every day use and this one consistently made the lists. Very reasonable for 12 pc place setting, but feels sturdy and balanced, like more high end sets typically sold individually. Nice sized fork and spoon, not too large or small. Great choice. Works best with traditional or transitional decor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Upgrade to Our Everyday Flatware
customer_reviews.text: I could not be more pleased with my new Portola Stainless Steel Flatware. Service for 12 at a great price point. Looks wonderful on the table and have received many compliments. Has a nice weight and feels good in my hands.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Gilead

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: The set is a bit more expensive than others similar in quantity but worth every penny. While they're not intended for elegant dinner parties, they're not too far off. Happy I bought it. Nothing about the utensils looks cheap. Frankly, I was rather surprised at the quality when the set arrived. Would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: T. Ewing

customer_reviews.title: Nice... but rusty.
customer_reviews.text: This set is beautiful! They are a good, weighty utensil BUT every knife I have washed now has rust spots on it. I haven’t had the set for a month yet. Currently trying to contact the seller to remedy. Would be hesitant to recommend purchase because of this.
customer_reviews.author: JBarton

customer_reviews.title: Very nice quality and weight
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality and weight. Sizes of forks and spoons aren't too big like some flatware. Nice looking set and I have looked for years for a set that looked nice where the size of the spoons and forks weren't obnoxiously big. They do fingerprint up on the handles since it is a shiny finish which is my only complaint. If setting the table for company, I will probably have to touch up all the handles for prints and water spots even though I always use the "Finish Rinse Aid" in my dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Peg

customer_reviews.title: RUSTS!
customer_reviews.text: TERRIBLE! Within 1 month 6 knives were so rusted that I can't use them. Several other reviews mentioned that but I thought Lenox would have better products than that. I was really disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: pdiz

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality finish
customer_reviews.text: We only used these less than a week and marks appeared that will not polish out or wash off. The set is nice weight & style is good but the finish spots/tarnished. I would not use with guests at all. Very disappointed with a Lenox product !
customer_reviews.author: Linda H.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This silverware feels and looks expensive. Like reallyyyyy expensive. It’s so nice!
customer_reviews.author: Lori Harless Presnell

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful flatware set at a great price
customer_reviews.text: I had my old flatware set for many years and it was starting to look pretty bad. When I began to do research, I found that this set is top selling in amazon and now I know why. It is beautiful, sturdy, love the simple design that fit a traditional or modern taste. The price could not be beat. Glad I made this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: EBATL

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Flatware
customer_reviews.text: I am so pleased with this purchase! Very elegant everyday flatware, my husband even made a comment about the weight and feel of them. You will not go wrong with these...very nice!
customer_reviews.author: Love 2 Shop

customer_reviews.title: Nice flatware.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent flatware. We added this set to our existing set so we didn't have to use a mix of whatever we had on holidays.
customer_reviews.author: J.B.

customer_reviews.title: Nice food grabbers
customer_reviews.text: Nice heavy silverware. Little bit bigger than I thought they would be, but they still work great at putting the food into my mouth!
customer_reviews.author: Sean Doran

customer_reviews.title: Stunning
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my weekend getaway/retirement home. We tend to entertain more there and had need for service for 12. This set is gorgeous. It has good weight and size. It is very polished, yet with a simple design. I smile every time I open the silverware drawer. Previous reviews say the knives rust in the dishwasher. I'm not taking any chances! I handwash all the pieces. I would absolutely recommend this set to anyone in the market for flatware.
customer_reviews.author: Sher

customer_reviews.title: SOMEWHAT PLEASED
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THE DESIGN AND WEIGHT OF PRODUCT. HOWEVER, ALREADY NOTING SPOTS ON SOME OF THE PIECES. WONDERING ON THEIR DURABILITY.
customer_reviews.author: JAMES R SMITH

customer_reviews.title: Amazing, Beautiful, and extremely durable.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set for my mother and it is absolutely BEAUTIFUL! The detail is outstanding as well as the look and feel. They are the perfect size, often times silverware is so bulky and big that it is uncomfortable to use and hold in your hand. This is the best size, which is extremely hard to find. I would order this again except it was the perfect amount of silverware and it is extremely durable so I won't need more silverware for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Coco

customer_reviews.title: Very impressive! You can use at your finest dinner gatherings.
customer_reviews.text: The most elegant silver ware I have had. You can tell the quality by its weight. This is absolutely perfect for day to day. Also I use it to entertain at my finest dinner gathering.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Schweitzer

customer_reviews.title: What a joy to set the dinner table!
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my everyday dinnerware. I am absolutely stunned every time I set the dinner table at the beauty it brings to my place settings! I’ve never gotten so many compliments before!!
customer_reviews.author: Tina Stadeli

customer_reviews.title: but the set feels nice in my hand
customer_reviews.text: The large spoon is a bit small, the large fork is a bit large, but the set feels nice in my hand. The teaspoon is great for coffee, perfect size. Again the large fork is a bit big, but then the small fork is not small at all it's almost full sized.
customer_reviews.author: Cary

customer_reviews.title: Nice flatware with mediocre quality
customer_reviews.text: The flatware is nice but after 1.5 years of using a rusty spots appeared on most knives .
customer_reviews.author: Tomasz Bednarski

customer_reviews.title: Lovely flatware! . Simply excellent, high end.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic flatware.! I highly recommend this set of flatware. The pieces are lovely. Impressive, perfect! I would definitely purchase again. Very pleased with them. Excellent value. Simply excellent, high end.
customer_reviews.author: Dr Ed

customer_reviews.title: Good Flatware
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for everyday use. The weight and feel is what you want from your flatware. For the price this is definitely worth getting.
customer_reviews.author: Mark W.

customer_reviews.title: Grand Quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought this 12 piece set bc I liked my old 8 piece set so much but lost a few pieces. It’s slightly larger than my old set but that’s okay! Very nice for what you get...plus I love Lenox:)
customer_reviews.author: TimelessInSeattle

customer_reviews.title: Excellently balanced flatware that feels substantial in your hands.
customer_reviews.text: I like the simplistic design and how the flatware feels 'expensive'. I was surprised at how weighty the knives are, especially. They come out of the dishwasher gleaming.
customer_reviews.author: CHRIS POPKEN

customer_reviews.title: Missing items
customer_reviews.text: Flatware is great quality and beautiful. However I read reviews before I bought it and noticed some people had missing items when their package arrived. Same was true for me when it arrived. I had to get a replacement package sent to include all missing items. Other than that, I love this flatware. Just be careful to check in order to make sure you get everything you are supposed to.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Great Silverware
customer_reviews.text: These are high quality and beautiful. Very sturdy silverware, and the knives can even cut most meat without being too sharp for kids to use.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Smooth and nice.
customer_reviews.text: Love the new pieces. A little wide at the base and don’t fit in the dishwasher caddy. We just put them in one big clump together.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: I had read the reviews regarding the finish. I didn’t think it could be that bad but it is. I have had other flatware more and less expensive without this issue. I wish I had sent the set back!
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: They’re heavy and sturdy. Mine haven’t corroded or rusted at all. We put them in the dishwasher and they still look brand new after a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Shelton

customer_reviews.title: Looks great !!!
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what I wanted. Love the design and it's the perfect size and weight !
customer_reviews.author: Kathy McMahan

customer_reviews.title: Great deal. Very pretty
customer_reviews.text: Needed as extra silverware for thanksgiving. Close match to what I already had. It was perfect and the price was right. Some pieces are still mixed in with my everyday silverware which was much higher priced same brand and if Im not paying attention I Barely notice
customer_reviews.author: sara s.

customer_reviews.title: This is so well made and the price was excellent. I can see how other people may be ...
customer_reviews.text: This is so well made and the price was excellent. I can see how other people may be bothered by the fingerprints but they wipe away easily. Have used them and run them through the dishwasher. The size is great as well, we have a wide variety of people and they work well for the smallest and the largest.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa C

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful set
customer_reviews.text: I love this flatware. It has a very nice detail on handles. Simple but yet elegant. Very comfortable in hand. Would definitely recommend this pattern. Great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good price for nice stainless
customer_reviews.text: Really pretty, high polished stainless silverware. It sets a nice table.
customer_reviews.author: Oregon Native

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I love this silverware! It’s beautiful and cleans nicely. I have had no problems with putting. It’s a great buy because you get so many pieces!
customer_reviews.author: Katie Swinson

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!!
customer_reviews.text: These are so beautiful! Very nice weight to them too.
customer_reviews.author: Karen R. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Defective!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this product! I bought it on October 21, 2017. I did not use the flatware from January thru March. On my return, I noticed that the knives are already pitted. Neither Amazon nor Lenox take any responsibility for this defective product! Do not buy!
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: This is a beautiful set. It looks elegant on the table
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful set. It looks elegant on the table. Feels sturdy in your hand. I have nothing negative to say about the set. You won't be disappointed in your purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: I did not know if she would like them. The knife handle is heavy
customer_reviews.text: My wife said keep them. I did not know if she would like them. The knife handle is heavy, the blade is sharper than expected. The spoon and fork handles are slim which might be an issue to some. Might be considered dainty feeling. The finish does look good.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Massapequa

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This set is beautiful! I bought for my Mother for her birthday and she loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Anned Aguirre

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I love our new kitchenwares. It looks very fancy and nice heavy feeling to hold and so shiny after using it for last 3 months everyday. Easy to clean and it doesn’t stain at all.
customer_reviews.author: Dulguun

customer_reviews.title: Skip these.
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, very comfortable to hold. Unfortunately a fingerprint magnet and scratches up easely.
customer_reviews.author: Emmanuel Davidoff

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed and deciding whether to return or not
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed the forks and spoons are stamped: LENOX 18/10 Indonesia. This was never disclosed in the detailed product description, nor shown in any of the product photos.
customer_reviews.author: Joan G.

customer_reviews.title: Breathtaking
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely stunning, the Portola has delicate beading, sturdy and will go with your basic dinnerware and stands out beautifully with your china, I am so pleased with this product that I ordered another Portola set 🕊💐🦋
customer_reviews.author: Turtledove14

customer_reviews.title: Great flatware
customer_reviews.text: We just got these but so far, they are great. Beautiful shine, good weight, the knives have a bit of a serrated edge which is perfect, and good size. If it rusts or has other issues I will update my review
customer_reviews.author: anon87

customer_reviews.title: Great bargain
customer_reviews.text: I run a small vacation rental property and it is important to always have a full set of silverware available for guests. Now I can easily replace a knife or fork that goes missing and my tenants will always have a matching set of beautiful cutlery. I will also use this set for my annual Christmas party. A great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Cleare

customer_reviews.title: No regrets about this one!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice set of flatware, and it will do 12 complete place settings. I just got them so time will tell how they hold up, but it is heavy, and seems sturdy. I can't believe I waited so long to buy these. My other flatware seems flimsy and dull next to this set. These are lovely! I am impressed. Much prettier and shinier in person than they appear online. Just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rust on knives.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had them for a month and have rust on my knifes. Not the quality as stated. I guess you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.author: Edgard J.

customer_reviews.title: good quality
customer_reviews.text: Very heavy duty silverware You definitely get what you pay for. Very pleased with the quality and would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful silverware
customer_reviews.text: I love this flatware. It's just the right weight and the design is what I wanted. It can water spot but it won't happen if you dry them completely after washing them. I recommend this set.
customer_reviews.author: Lynette Van Gerpen

product_meta.title: Lenox Portola 65-Piece Flatware Set, 10.00 LB, Metallic
product_meta.description: Style:Flatware, 65-PieceAt Lenox, we strive to make the daily moments in your life a bit more special. Inspired by heritage and designed for now, we bring a rich history of craftsmanship to modern day life. We’ve been a part of homes for over 130 years. Each time you buy Lenox, you are buying a versatile and timeless piece crafted with our century-long commitment to quality, artistry and beauty. Whether you’re gathering the family for dinner, grabbing a midnight snack for yourself in front of the TV or having friends over, Lenox is for real moments that last on products that are meant for living. The Portola 65-piece Flatware Set by Lenox features flared handles with a beaded channel at each base. Crafted from brilliant 18/10 stainless steel, this elaborate and silverware set includes twelve dinner forks, salad forks, dinner knives, tablespoons, and teaspoons, in addition to a serving spoon, pierced serving spoon, sugar spoon, butter knife, and serving fork.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
